Botha (nke a na-akpọ /ˈbʊərtə/ olumba ndị na-abụghị nke Rhotic nke Bekee, Afrikaans pronunciation: ) bụ aha nna Afrikaans, nke sitere na Friso-Saxon Both. Frederich Botha wetara ya na Odịda Africa n'afọ 1678.
Ndị nne na nna nke agbụrụ ahụ bụ Maria Kickers, onye mbụ ya na Ferdinandùs Appel mekọrọ, na dịya bụ Frederich Botha.

Tupu Maria Kickers alụa Frederich Botha  Maria Kickers nwere nwa na-abụghị di ma ọ bụ nwunye nke Ferdinandùs Appel, onye ọzọ Hollander si n'ezinụlọ Amsterdam mụrụ. Nwa a, bụ nwa nwoke aha ya bụ Theunis, ka ndị Bothas mesịrị kuchie
Ha lụrụ di na 1714, Kickers na Botha mechara rụọ ọrụ ugbo n'etiti Stellenbosch na Somerset West. Taa, ụmụ ha iwu kwadoro dị ihe dị ka mmadụ puku iri asaa na isii, otu nari na iri abuo nise gụnyere:
